result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Trayvon Earl Kern

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Trayvon Earl Kern.  Prosecuting attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 

Case is set for a Status Conference. Defense Counsel requests a Preliminary Hearing date. Case is adjourned. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant's Demand for Speedy Trial.  (Trayvon E. Kern - #202200797, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Defendant's Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Trayvon E. Kern - #2022009797, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern not in court, in custody.  Attorney Thomas Paul Alberti in court for Trayvon Earl Kern.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Defense motion to withdraw as counsel due to a conflict is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant. Case adjourned for CAUSE for status of counsel in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Status conference scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

State notified the court after the case was called that the case is in need of a preliminary hearing date. Court scheduled a preliminary hearing date with parties. Case adjourned to the preliminary hearing court for a preliminary hearing.

Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Thomas Paul Alberti appeared by video for Trayvon Earl Kern.  Prosecuting attorney Daniel T Flaherty in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Defense not in receipt of an offer from the State. Court orders the State to send the defense an offer within the next 5 days. Case adjourned to Branch 9.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Adjustment Number: 22A 088163,
Payable Number: 1032393,
Receipt Number: 22RP037084,
Amount: $20.00

Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern not in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for cause to the trial court for a State V. Lee Hearing.
Hearing scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Motion for Discovery - 2ND DEMAND REQUEST.  (Trayvon E. Kern - #2022009797, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Trayvon Kern not in court, in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for State of Wisconsin in court.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Status of Counsel in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Status conference scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Electronic Monitoring.   If an Electronic Monitoring Device (GPS) is unavailable and Cash Bail has been paid, Defendant to remain in custody until a device becomes available.
Monitoring is 24 hour curfew with exception of verified medical appointment.
  Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern in court with attorney Margo Elise Clark.  Defendant Trayvon Earl Kern in custody.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Hanrahan, Branch 04. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
